mapper.select: select b.bno, b.title, b.writer, b.regDate, b.status, concat('s_',i.uuid,'_',i.fileName) fileName from tbl_board b left outer join tbl_board_image i on i.bno = b.bno where (i.ord = 0 or i.ord is null) and b.status = 0 order by b.bno desc limit #{skip}, #{size}
